select * from ex_order a
where a.coinCode=#{coinCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.fixPriceCoinCode=#{fixPriceCoinCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.id desc limit 0,1

select * from ex_order a where
a.fixPriceCoinCode=#{fixPriceCoinCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.coinCode=#{coinCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.id desc limit 0,2

select * from (select * from ex_order a where
a.coinCode=#{coinCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.fixPriceCoinCode=#{fixPriceCoinCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.orderTimestapm desc limit 0,#{count} ) as b ORDER BY orderTimestapm asc

SELECT SUM(transactionSum)/SUM(transactionCount) averagePrice from ex_order where transactionTime >= DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 20 MINUTE) and coinCode =#{coinCode} and fixPriceCoinCode=#{fixPriceCoinCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ;
